an9.37:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an9.37:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma anando bhikkhu amantesi:
an9.37:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa paccassosum.
an9.37:2.2: Yavancidam tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sambadhe okasadhigamo anubuddho sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya.
an9.37:2.3: Tadeva nama cakkhum bhavissati te rupa tancayatanam no patisamvedissati.
an9.37:2.4: Tadeva nama sotam bhavissati te sadda tancayatanam no patisamvedissati.
an9.37:2.5: Tadeva nama ghanam bhavissati te gandha tancayatanam no patisamvedissati.
an9.37:2.6: Sava nama jivha bhavissati te rasa tancayatanam no patisamvedissati.
an9.37:2.7: Sova nama kayo bhavissati te photthabba tancayatanam no patisamvedissati”ti.
an9.37:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an9.37:3.2: “sannimeva nu kho, avuso ananda, tadayatanam no patisamvedeti udahu asanni”ti?
an9.37:3.3: “Sannimeva kho, avuso, tadayatanam no patisamvedeti, no asanni”ti.
an9.37:4.2: “Idhavuso, bhikkhu, sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:4.3: Evamsannipi kho, avuso, tadayatanam no patisamvedeti.
an9.37:5.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:5.2: Evamsannipi kho, avuso, tadayatanam no patisamvedeti.
an9.37:6.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:6.2: Evamsannipi kho, avuso, tadayatanam no patisamvedetiti.
an9.37:7.1: Ekamidaham, avuso, samayam sakete viharami anjanavane migadaye.
an9.37:7.2: Atha kho, avuso, jatilavasika bhikkhuni yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, avuso, jatilavasika bhikkhuni mam etadavoca:
an9.37:7.3: ‘yayam, bhante ananda, samadhi na cabhinato na capanato na ca sasankharaniggayhavaritagato,
an9.37:7.4: vimuttatta thito, thitatta santusito, santusitatta no paritassati.
an9.37:7.5: Ayam, bhante ananda, samadhi kimphalo vutto bhagavata’ti?
an9.37:8.1: Evam vutte, soham, avuso, jatilavasikam bhikkhunim etadavocam:
an9.37:8.2: ‘yayam, bhagini, samadhi na cabhinato na capanato na ca sasankharaniggayhavaritagato,
an9.37:8.3: vimuttatta thito, thitatta santusito, santusitatta no paritassati.
an9.37:8.4: Ayam, bhagini, samadhi annaphalo vutto bhagavata’ti.
an9.37:8.5: Evamsannipi kho, avuso, tadayatanam no patisamvedeti”ti.
